author: The Linux Foundation
description:
This week, LF Quick Hits covers some massive shifts across tech, AI, and even Hollywood:

🔥 A Supreme Court battle that could change how we fight patent trolls forever.
🎬 Open source is driving major visual effects innovations—The Wild Robot is just the beginning.
🛠️ WebAssembly is expanding fast—it’s not just a buzzword, it’s changing cloud-native and edge computing.
🤖 AI meets academia—PyTorch is helping the next generation push AI forward.

Open source is powering everything from Supreme Court cases to blockbuster movies to cutting-edge AI—and we’ve got it all in one-minute. 🎥

🔗 Check out the link below for all the details! 👇
title: 🌎 Open source is shaping the future—and fast.
